text: Central Mall is a shopping mall located in Fort Smith, Arkansas. It opened in 1971 and is anchored by Dillard's and JCPenney. The mall is owned and managed by Namdar Realty Group. ==History== ===Renovations=== The mall underwent a major renovation in 1999, which included new flooring, skylights, interior finishes and site lighting. Other improvements include a domed food court with an outside dining area, a seating capacity of 350, and a children's soft play area constructed in 1975. ===Sears Closing=== On January 28, 2018, the mall lost one of its anchor tenants when Sears permanently closed. ==Anchor tenants== * Dillard's * JCPenney ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Shopping malls established in 1971 Category:Shopping malls in Arkansas Category:Buildings and structures in Fort Smith, Arkansas Category:Tourist attractions in Sebastian County, Arkansas Category:Namdar Realty Group
